_instrument*"}},"initInstrument(address,uint8,address)":{"details":"initializes an instrument","params":{"_instrument":"the address of the instrument to be asset"}},"initInstrumentWithData(address,string,string,uint8,address)":{"details":"initializes a instrument using iTokenData provided externally (useful if the underlying ERC20 contract doesn't expose initialized","_interestRateStrategyAddress":"the address of the interest rate strategy contract for this instrument*","_underlyingAssetDecimals":"the decimals of the instrument underlying asset"}},"removeLastAddedInstrument(address)":{"details":"removes the last added instrument in the list of the instruments","params":{"_instrumentToRemove":"the address of the new value for the loan to value*"}},"setInstrumentDecimals(address,uint256)":{"details":"updates the _instrument decimals","params":{"_decimals":"the new number of decimals*","_instrument":"the address of the _instrument"}},"setInstrumentInterestRateStrategyAddress(address,address)":{"details":"sets the interest rate strategy of a _instrument","params":{"_instrument":"the address of the _instrument","_rateStrategyAddress":"the new address of the interest strategy contract*"}},"setInstrumentLiquidationBonus(address,uint256)":{"details":"updates the liquidation bonus of a nodes.name: deactivateInstrument

nodes.documentation:
@dev freezes an _instrument. A freezed _instrument doesn't accept any new deposit, borrow or rate swap, but can accept repayments, liquidations, rate rebalances and redeems
@param _instrument the address of the _instrument*
nodes.name: freezeInstrument

nodes.documentation:
@dev unfreezes a _instrument
@param _instrument the address of the _instrument*
nodes.name: unfreezeInstrument
setInstrumentBaseLTVasCollateral
setInstrumentLiquidationThreshold
setInstrumentLiquidationBonus
setInstrumentDecimals
setInstrumentInterestRateStrategyAddress

nodes.documentation: @dev refreshes the lending pool core configuration to update the cached address*
nodes.name: updateSIGHSpeedRatioForAnInstrument

devdoc.author: Aave, SIGH Finance (modified by SIGH FINANCE)

disableInstrumentStableBorrowRate(addres.details: disable stable rate borrowing on a _instrument

params._stableBorrowRateEnabled: true if stable borrow rate needs to be enabled by default on this instrument*

enableInstrumentAsCollateral(address,uin.details: enables a instrument to be used as collateral

params._baseLTVasCollateral: the loan to value of the asset when used as collateral
params._liquidationBonus: the bonus liquidators receive to liquidate this asset*
params._liquidationThreshold: the threshold at which loans using this asset as collateral will be considered undercollateralized

enableInstrumentStableBorrowRate(address.details: enable stable rate borrowing on a instrument

freezeInstrument(address).details: freezes an _instrument. A freezed _instrument doesn't accept any new deposit, borrow or rate swap, but can accept repayments, liquidations, rate rebalances and redeems

params._instrument: the address of the instrument to be initialized
params._interestRateStrategyAddress: the address of the interest rate strategy contract for this instrument*
params._underlyingAssetDecimals: the decimals of the instrument underlying asset

initInstrumentWithData(address,string,st.details: initializes a instrument using iTokenData provided externally (useful if the underlying ERC20 contract doesn't expose name or decimals)

params._iTokenName: the name of the iToken contract
params._iTokenSymbol: the symbol of the iToken contract
params._instrument: the address of the instrument to be initialized
params._interestRateStrategyAddress: the address of the interest rate strategy contract for this instrument*
params._underlyingAssetDecimals: the decimals of the instrument underlying asset

removeLastAddedInstrument(address).details: removes the last added instrument in the list of the instruments

setInstrumentBaseLTVasCollateral(address.details: emitted when a _instrument loan to value is updated

params._ltv: the new value for the loan to value*

setInstrumentInterestRateStrategyAddress.details: sets the interest rate strategy of a _instrument

params._rateStrategyAddress: the new address of the interest strategy contract*

setInstrumentLiquidationBonus(address,ui.details: updates the liquidation bonus of a _instrument

params._bonus: the new value for the liquidation bonus*

setInstrumentLiquidationThreshold(addres.details: updates the liquidation threshold of a _instrument.

params._threshold: the new value for the liquidation threshold*

updateSIGHSpeedRatioForAnInstrument(addr.details: refreshes the lending pool core configuration to update the cached address*

devdoc.title: LendingPoolConfigurator contract

userdoc.notice: Executes configuration methods on the LendingPoolCore contract. Allows to enable/disable instruments, and set different protocol parameters.*
